intro: Glossanthis, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its velvety, dark green leaves and showy, clustered flowers. Glossanthis thrives in bright, indirect light and requires well-draining soil to prevent root rot.
